pageContent: Objectives: To analyse the survival rate among prostate cancer patients with conservative treatment. To compare survival between individuals with localised and invasive tumours, as well as between subjects below and above 70 years old at the time of diagnosis.

metaData.source:
From early detection to rehabilitation in the community: reading beyond the blog testimonies of survivors' quality of life and prostate cancer representation
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/27986091/
